Project Title: The nature of audip-visual media. To develop through
the&oretical analyisis and practical experimentation a clear notion
of the peculiar style, structure and impact of the principal audio-visual
media (Radio, Film, Television, Photography) which are changing
a civilization based primarily on the printed word, profoundly in¬
fluencing the mind of young people, and offernSew challenges to
educational methodology. The objective of obtaining a fresh under¬
standing of these media is to contribute to their better utilization in
the educational process and to the critical training of student audiences
so they may experience them profitably while avoiding their many pitfalls.
This is merely my first draft of such a definition, and I regret
enormously that we do not have the opportunity to talk this over in
greater detail so we may further sharpen the focus and limit its scope.
I am a..are that I have broadened the scope to a point where it might
be impossible to accomplish it within the time and personel limitations.

With best regards.
